item.title: [CTF - Santhacklaus-2019] Survivall
item.description: Survive all was a challenge proposed during the Santhacklaus CTF 2019. It was one of the hardest challenge of the competiton. Only one objective : obtain a root access. Step 1 : Perimeter discovery 1.1. Services We started this challenge with a classical services recon. PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp closed ssh 80/tcp open http Apache httpd 2.4.38 | http-methods: |_ Supported Methods: HEAD |_http-title: Survive All The best survival tech guide Service Info: Host: 172.
